action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: The image shows the reception area of Ivy Hospital, a healthcare facility. There is a reception desk with several staff members seated behind it. A person is standing at the desk, interacting with the staff. The area is well-lit with a modern design, featuring a polished floor and signage indicating the reception area. There are also signs pointing to different sections of the hospital in the background.

ANSWER: The reception area is located in the center of the image, with the reception desk and staff
action.label: response

action.content:
You’re exploring Mapworld, a network of various connected rooms, and your aim is to reach the Escape Room.
Here is the description of what the Escape Room looks like:  description: the image shows the reception area of ivy hospital, a healthcare facility. there is a reception desk with several staff members seated behind it. a person is standing at the desk, interacting with the staff. the area is well-lit with a modern design, featuring a polished floor and signage indicating the reception area. there are also signs pointing to different sections of the hospital in the background.

answer: the reception area is located in the center of the image, with the reception desk and staff
At each step you will receive the image of your current room. Based on what you know of the Escape Room from my description and the image you see,
choose one of three actions:

1. If your current image matches your memory of the Escape Room description, reply with only one word
ESCAPE

2. If you need more information to verify if it’s the same room, reply -
QUESTION: your question here

3. If your current room is definitely a different room, pick a direction from ['west', 'south'] to move, and reply -
MOVE: direction you chose

Do not generate any additional text.
action.label: context
